T02D2998:59a-0: @59a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2998:59a-1: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa las klu
T02D2998:59a-2: la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams tshim par 'dod pa'i
T02D2998:59a-4: snod rab tu mdzes shing dri ma med pa'i nang
T02D2998:59a-5: du chu gtsang ma srog chags med pa la 'bru
T02D2998:59a-6: sna tshogs kyi phye ma dang rin po che lnga
T02D2998:59a-8: dri lnga dang me tog lnga la sogs pas bltams la bdag nyid kha bshal la /
T02D2998:59a-9: na mo rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus dgongs su gsol //
T02D2998:59a-10: bla ma dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2998:59a-11: bla ma dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2998:59a-12: bla ma dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi //
T02D2998:59a-13: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
T02D2998:59a-14: dge ba bgyid la rjes yi rang //
T02D2998:59a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D2998:59a-17: bsags pa'i dge ba bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D2998:59a-18: kun kyang byang chub thob par smon //
T02D2998:59a-19: bla ma dkon mchog spyan snga ru //
T02D2998:59a-20: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2998:59a-21: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi ;
T02D2998:59a-22: / ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya //
T02D2998:59a-23: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2998:59a-24: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2998:59a-26: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sngon du stong pa nyid la blo gnas par byas la /
T02D2998:59a-27: tshad med pa bzhi rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2998:59a-28: de'i 'og tu bdag nyid sku mdog dkar po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas la /
T02D2998:59a-29: aom sarba aa ya sv'a h'a zhes chos nyid dbyings
T02D2998:59a-30: rnam par dag pa'i rang sgras gtor ma'i nyes pa'i
T02D2998:59a-32: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ro mchog brgya dang ldan par dmigs so //
T02D2998:59a-33: de nas na ma: sa manta badzra n'am zhes brjod cing /
T02D2998:59b-0: @59b lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang ldan bas bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /
T02D2998:59b-2: nyan rang dang khams gsum na gnas pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba'i srung ma dang /
T02D2998:59b-4: rtsod pa phrag dog med par bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2998:59b-5: de nas aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2998:59b-6: sarba aa pa dz'a ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas
T02D2998:59b-7: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du tshim par mos pa
T02D2998:59b-8: bya'o // de nas tshigs bcad 'di dag rnams kyang brjod do //
T02D2998:59b-9: chos dang mi 'jigs zang zing gis //
T02D2998:59b-10: srid bzhi'i 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2998:59b-11: yab yum sras dang bcas rnams la //
T02D2998:59b-12: zhing khams dpag tu med pa na //
T02D2998:59b-13: bzhugs shing ston pa 'khor dang bcas //
T02D2998:59b-14: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed dang //
T02D2998:59b-15: nyan thos rnams dang rangs sangs rgyas //
T02D2998:59b-16: dgra bcom dri ma med rnams la //
T02D2998:59b-17: mchod sbyin dag gis gtor ma bsngo //
T02D2998:59b-18: yon tan mgron du gyur pa ni //
T02D2998:59b-19: tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad //
T02D2998:59b-20: rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu //
T02D2998:59b-21: gza' brgyad klu brgyad 'phrog ma'i bu //
T02D2998:59b-22: mkha' 'gro ma dang chos skyong rnams //
T02D2998:59b-23: stong grogs mgon tshul byed la bsngo //
T02D2998:59b-24: lan chags mgron gyi rigs rnams la //
T02D2998:59b-25: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang //
T02D2998:59b-26: khyad par mchog rigs bco lnga dang /
T02D2998:59b-27: klu dang sa bdag ma mo dang //
T02D2998:59b-28: bdud dang rgyal po btsan rigs dang //
T02D2998:59b-29: sa srin klu srin btsan rigs dang //
T02D2998:59b-31: sngon gyi lan chags snyegs la bsngo //
T02D2998:59b-32: snying rje'i mgron du gyur pa ni //
T02D2998:59b-33: khams gsum 'khor ba'i rigs drug ste //
T02D2998:59b-34: skye bzhi lam lngas bsdus pa yi //
T02D2998:59b-35: sems can rnams la ci rigs par //
T02D2998:59b-36: thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig / byol song gcig la gcig za ba //
T02D2998:59b-37: de rnams bde dang ldan nas kyang //
T02D2998:59b-38: yi dags rnams la zas skom dang //
T02D2998:59b-39: ji ltar 'dod pa thob gyur cig //
T02D2998:59b-40: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gang//
T02D2998:59b-41: mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D2998:59b-42: de dag rnams las thar bar shog / ces bsngo'o //
T02D2998:59b-43: gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par bsngo //
T02D2998:59b-44: klu rnams mnyes par byed pa'i chu la brten pa'i
T02D2998:59b-45: gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dpal
